name: 5 Ultra Soft Cloth Wipes
description:
Kashmir Baby's Your baby will love the softness against their delicate
skin! The wipes measure 8”x 8”~a perfect fit for wipe 
warmers. Have you ever read the ingredients on 
disposable wipes at the store to find many chemicals, 
synthetic fragrances, & preservatives? By using cloth 
wipes you can avoid these harsh, irritating substances 
against your little ones skin.    
Make Great Washcloths!
How to Use Cloth Wipes: Purchase or make an all 
natural cloth wipe solution & put it in a spray bottle for 
on-the-go & along with your cloth wipes in wipe 
warmers. Our recipe favorites are:  
#1 10 cups water, 1.5 Tbsp baby wash, 2 tsp sweet 
almond oil
#2  Great for rashes! Follow #1 above plus add: 1 tsp of
~calendula oil (heals irritated skin & is an antiseptic) & 
~lavender oil (antimicrobial & antibacterial, heals skin). 
Mix solution in a container (store unused portion in 
fridge). Essential oils can be bought online & in the 
vitamin section at stores.
 Voted best cloth diapers by moms! Savings~each additional item purchased from seller will be discounted to $1.00 for shipping and handling @ checkout.
Includes: 5 cloth wipes.
Made of 100% polyester.

name: 3 Easy Pocket Organic Cotton and Hemp Inserts and 5 cloth wipes/ washcloths
description:
Kashmir Baby's new, innovative Hemp Easy Pouch Inserts~ are incredibly thin, highly absorbent, easy to guide into the diaper pocket, and contoured for the perfect fit. No need to fold inserts or to guess how many to stuff so your diapers don't leak.

Do you ever find that regular inserts on the market seem to be too bulky between the thighs? Doesn’t it seem like it would be hard to crawl or move with all that bulk? Kashmir Baby’s inner layers are contoured, having more layers through the middle where protection is needed and fewer layers at the edges allowing for a more comfortable fit between your little ones inner thighs. By having the two sizes the inserts remain as thin as possible for what your little one needs~ decreasing any bulkiness.

2 insert sizes are available~small & large. When used with our diapers a small insert holds 1/3 cup of liquid waste; a large holds 2/3 cups. Use 1 small insert per diaper and if your diapers start to leak either as your baby gets older or at nighttime ~ it indicates more protection is needed. Then, begin using 1 large insert per diaper. Each baby will vary as to when or if they will need the larger size, depending on how frequently they are changed. We have seen babies changed frequently going to the larger size around 15 months of age. Choose the insert size you would like from the drop down menu. 
Visit kashmirbaby.com/ to learn more.  We have a 90 day return policy. Savings~each additional item purchased from seller will be discounted to $1.00 for shipping and handling @ checkout.
Includes: 3 Easy Pocket Inserts for cloth diapers
